name: Desonide
indications_original: Desonide Cream and Lotion are low to medium potency corticosteroids indicated for the relief of the inflammatory and pruritic manifestations of corticosteroid responsive dermatoses.
contraindications_original: Desonide Cream or Lotion should be applied to the affected areas as a thin film two or three times daily depending on the severity of the  condition. SHAKE LOTION WELL BEFORE USING. As with other corticosteroids, therapy should be discontinued when control is achieved. If no improvement is seen within 2 weeks, reassessment of diagnosis may be necessary. Desonide Cream and Lotion should not be used with occlusive dressings.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Desonide Cream 0.05% is supplied in a tube containing:
                  15 g NDC-63187-747-1560 g NDC 63187-747-60
adverseReactions_original: Desonide Cream and Lotion are contraindicated in those patients with a history of hypersensitivity to any of the components of the preparations.
